content: this quick and easy crochet ball is made using super bulky acrylic yarn you ll need a wire pet slicker brush to brush the amigurumi ball until it becomes fluffy you can even style the hair up or down materials & tools super bulky acrylic yarn 7mm crochet hook toy stuffing scissors yarn needle wire pet slicker brush 6mm black beads for eyes black sewing thread sewing needle size using super bulky weight yarn my ball ended up being about 5 cm 2 inches wide you can easily change the size by using different yarn weights
